outline.text: Mission Statement: To provide PTHSD high school students with the opportunity to

● 4 credits of Math ● 4 credits of Science ● 4 credits of STEM-designated electives ● Maintain an overall 2.85 GPA ● Participate in a minimum of 3 STEM presentations/conferences each year with a required minimum total of 12 presentations/conferences throughout the 4 years . * ● Join and actively participate in a STEM-related extracurricular activity or club every year of attendance. -
